## EmfPlgBlt.BkSrcArgb32Color property

Gets or sets a WMF ColorRef object ([MS-WMF] section 2.2.2.8) that specifies the background color of the source bitmap.

```csharp
public int BkSrcArgb32Color { get; set; }
```
